subject: Ethics
title: Decentralized Identity
description: A quick win: understand Decentralized Identity.

hook.text: Right now, Google and Facebook are your ID cards online. You log in through them. They own your identity.

buildup.text: Decentralized identity puts you in control. You hold verified credentials in a digital wallet â€” no middleman.

discovery.text: Like a physical wallet: you show your driver's license, not your whole government file, when asked for ID.

twist.text: If Facebook disables your account, you lose access to dozens of sites. Decentralized ID can't be taken away.

climax.text: The shift: from 'platforms own your identity' to 'you carry your identity.' That changes the power dynamic.

punchline.text: Your identity shouldn't have a landlord.

quiz.question: What is the main advantage of decentralized identity?
options: Users control their own credentials without relying on platforms
It eliminates the need for all passwords
